system.descriptionText: Comrade in Cohesion keeps watch of surrounding area. Until beginning of next turn Character can spend a Reaction to make a single Standard Ranged Attack with -20 against one foe that has targeted them with a Ranged Attack. Their shot goes first, if it kills or incapacitates their attacker, their attack is canceled, otherwise the attack occurs normally.
